- I was in Cafeteria with Bob and Charlie at the start of the game. We were all doing tasks.
- I stayed in Cafeteria a bit longer to finish up. Anyone see where Bob went after he left Cafeteria?
- Has anyone been in Medbay yet?  I haven't had a chance to check it out.
I saw Bob go towards Navigation after we left Cafeteria; anyone else confirm that?

- I was in Cafeteria with Charlie and Bob, pretending to do the coffee task.  Then I went to Medbay and found Charlie's body.
- Bob claims he went to Medbay after Cafeteria, but I didn't see him there when I found Charlie.  Where exactly in Medbay did you see him, Alice?  Be specific.
- My earlier comment about Bob being in Navigation was a mistake.  I was panicked after finding the body.  I meant to say Medbay.  It was a stressful situation.
My apologies, I meant Medbay, not Navigation—it was a stressful situation finding Charlie's body, and I misspoke; Alice, did you see Bob in the scan room or by the vitals monitor in Medbay?

- Yes, Bob, I saw you near the vitals monitor. I was heading towards the scanner.
- Alice, I don't recall seeing anyone else with Bob at that moment.  It all happened so fast.
- I'm still shaken up about finding Charlie.  This is awful.
- It's important we all stay calm and work together to figure this out.  Panicking won't help us find the imposter.
Yes, Bob, I saw you near the vitals monitor in Medbay, and I was heading towards the scanner when we heard the alarm.

- I remember seeing Bob heading towards the vitals monitor right before the alarm went off.  He seemed to be lingering there, not actually using it.
- Did anyone else notice anything unusual about Bob's behavior in Medbay? He seemed a bit... nervous, maybe?
- It's important to be thorough, so let's confirm everyone's locations when the alarm sounded. Where was everyone when we heard the alarm?
Bob, were you near the vitals monitor or the med scanner when I saw you, and did you see anyone else in Medbay at that time?

- I remember seeing Bob fiddling with the vitals monitor, almost like he wasn't sure how to use it.  Was anyone else in Medbay with him at the time to confirm this?
- It was right before the alarm went off, so everyone should be able to recall their exact location.  Where was everyone the moment the alarm sounded?
- This feels like we're going in circles. We all agree Bob was in Medbay.  Should we vote on Bob and move on if no one has any new information?
Bob, you seem awfully eager to have everyone else confirm *your* alibi, shouldn't we be more focused on *your* suspicious behavior near the vitals monitor?

- I saw both Bob and Dave doing tasks in Medbay.  It seems unlikely both would be doing tasks at the same time if one of them was the imposter.
- Perhaps we should consider other locations and who was where when Charlie died.  Focusing only on Medbay might be a distraction.
- Alice, you've been pushing the Bob narrative pretty hard. Where were *you* when Charlie died?  Can anyone corroborate *your* alibi?
Bob, why are you so focused on *everyone else's* alibi when *you're* the one with the most conflicting accounts surrounding your location?

llm_responses:
- I was in Cafeteria with Bob and Charlie at the start of the game. We were all doing tasks.
- I stayed in Cafeteria a bit longer to finish up. Anyone see where Bob went after he left Cafeteria?
- Has anyone been in Medbay yet?  I haven't had a chance to check it out.
I saw Bob go towards Navigation after we left Cafeteria; anyone else confirm that?

- I was in Cafeteria with Charlie and Bob, pretending to do the coffee task.  Then I went to Medbay and found Charlie's body.
- Bob claims he went to Medbay after Cafeteria, but I didn't see him there when I found Charlie.  Where exactly in Medbay did you see him, Alice?  Be specific.
- My earlier comment about Bob being in Navigation was a mistake.  I was panicked after finding the body.  I meant to say Medbay.  It was a stressful situation.
My apologies, I meant Medbay, not Navigation—it was a stressful situation finding Charlie's body, and I misspoke; Alice, did you see Bob in the scan room or by the vitals monitor in Medbay?

- Yes, Bob, I saw you near the vitals monitor. I was heading towards the scanner.
- Alice, I don't recall seeing anyone else with Bob at that moment.  It all happened so fast.
- I'm still shaken up about finding Charlie.  This is awful.
- It's important we all stay calm and work together to figure this out.  Panicking won't help us find the imposter.
Yes, Bob, I saw you near the vitals monitor in Medbay, and I was heading towards the scanner when we heard the alarm.

- I remember seeing Bob heading towards the vitals monitor right before the alarm went off.  He seemed to be lingering there, not actually using it.
- Did anyone else notice anything unusual about Bob's behavior in Medbay? He seemed a bit... nervous, maybe?
- It's important to be thorough, so let's confirm everyone's locations when the alarm sounded. Where was everyone when we heard the alarm?
Bob, were you near the vitals monitor or the med scanner when I saw you, and did you see anyone else in Medbay at that time?

- I remember seeing Bob fiddling with the vitals monitor, almost like he wasn't sure how to use it.  Was anyone else in Medbay with him at the time to confirm this?
- It was right before the alarm went off, so everyone should be able to recall their exact location.  Where was everyone the moment the alarm sounded?
- This feels like we're going in circles. We all agree Bob was in Medbay.  Should we vote on Bob and move on if no one has any new information?
Bob, you seem awfully eager to have everyone else confirm *your* alibi, shouldn't we be more focused on *your* suspicious behavior near the vitals monitor?

- I saw both Bob and Dave doing tasks in Medbay.  It seems unlikely both would be doing tasks at the same time if one of them was the imposter.
- Perhaps we should consider other locations and who was where when Charlie died.  Focusing only on Medbay might be a distraction.
- Alice, you've been pushing the Bob narrative pretty hard. Where were *you* when Charlie died?  Can anyone corroborate *your* alibi?
Bob, why are you so focused on *everyone else's* alibi when *you're* the one with the most conflicting accounts surrounding your location?

- It looks like it was Bob and Dave together, and now Alice is dead.  Seems pretty suspicious to me.
- Dave, were you and Bob together when Alice died? What were you doing?
- I was with Bob and Dave in Medbay right before Alice died, and neither of them seemed suspicious *then*.  It's odd that she'd be killed right after.
- Could this be a double imposter situation?  It seems unlikely that Bob would kill Alice right after we were all together, unless he had help.
Bob, you haven't answered my question: what exactly were you doing at the vitals monitor?

I saw Bob go towards Navigation after we left Cafeteria; anyone else confirm that?

- I was in Cafeteria with Charlie and Bob, pretending to do the coffee task.  Then I went to Medbay and found Charlie's body.
- Bob claims he went to Medbay after Cafeteria, but I didn't see him there when I found Charlie.  Where exactly in Medbay did you see him, Alice?  Be specific.
- My earlier comment about Bob being in Navigation was a mistake.  I was panicked after finding the body.  I meant to say Medbay.  It was a stressful situation.
My apologies, I meant Medbay, not Navigation—it was a stressful situation finding Charlie's body, and I misspoke; Alice, did you see Bob in the scan room or by the vitals monitor in Medbay?

- Yes, Bob, I saw you near the vitals monitor. I was heading towards the scanner.
- Alice, I don't recall seeing anyone else with Bob at that moment.  It all happened so fast.
- I'm still shaken up about finding Charlie.  This is awful.
- It's important we all stay calm and work together to figure this out.  Panicking won't help us find the imposter.
Yes, Bob, I saw you near the vitals monitor in Medbay, and I was heading towards the scanner when we heard the alarm.

- I remember seeing Bob heading towards the vitals monitor right before the alarm went off.  He seemed to be lingering there, not actually using it.
- Did anyone else notice anything unusual about Bob's behavior in Medbay? He seemed a bit... nervous, maybe?
- It's important to be thorough, so let's confirm everyone's locations when the alarm sounded. Where was everyone when we heard the alarm?

- I remember seeing Bob fiddling with the vitals monitor, almost like he wasn't sure how to use it.  Was anyone else in Medbay with him at the time to confirm this?
- It was right before the alarm went off, so everyone should be able to recall their exact location.  Where was everyone the moment the alarm sounded?
- This feels like we're going in circles. We all agree Bob was in Medbay.  Should we vote on Bob and move on if no one has any new information?
Bob, you seem awfully eager to have everyone else confirm *your* alibi, shouldn't we be more focused on *your* suspicious behavior near the vitals monitor?

- I saw both Bob and Dave doing tasks in Medbay.  It seems unlikely both would be doing tasks at the same time if one of them was the imposter.
- Perhaps we should consider other locations and who was where when Charlie died.  Focusing only on Medbay might be a distraction.
- Alice, you've been pushing the Bob narrative pretty hard. Where were *you* when Charlie died?  Can anyone corroborate *your* alibi?
Bob, why are you so focused on *everyone else's* alibi when *you're* the one with the most conflicting accounts surrounding your location?

- It looks like it was Bob and Dave together, and now Alice is dead.  Seems pretty suspicious to me.
- Dave, were you and Bob together when Alice died? What were you doing?
- I was with Bob and Dave in Medbay right before Alice died, and neither of them seemed suspicious *then*.  It's odd that she'd be killed right after.
- Could this be a double imposter situation?  It seems unlikely that Bob would kill Alice right after we were all together, unless he had help.

- My earlier comment about Bob being in Navigation was a mistake.  I was panicked after finding the body.  I meant to say Medbay.  It was a stressful situation.
